title: Invite Regret, Stacey Abrams, Janet Hubert, Man Shells and more.
itunes:title: Invite Regret, Stacey Abrams, Janet Hubert, Man Shells and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! There is some sangin' going on in Dubai. The CLO must explain this Junior situation and the DM. Steve's impeccable style is still on display in Dubai. We got to get Stacey Abrams in for Governor of Georgia! Bad guests, hella good egg nog and all the other fun elements mixed together can create a regretful night. Steve and Junior talk football and finally a specific team got the W. Would You Rather involved hot showers and fried chicken. Actress Janet Hubert has a message about anger and love. A UK man's backside almost got blown up because of too much excitement. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve shows us the 80/20 prayer formula.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
